verses.name: Numbers 2:5
verses.text: And those that do pitch next unto him shall be the tribe of Issachar: and Nethaneel the son of Zuar shall be captain of the children of Issachar.

verses.name: Numbers 2:6
verses.text: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 2:7
verses.text: Then the tribe of Zebulun: and Eliab the son of Helon shall be captain of the children of Zebulun.

verses.name: Numbers 2:8
verses.text: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred.
